channel.title: Requesting best base :)
channel.description:
Willing to learn a new base, I used Pi a lot to learn & mess around with but a lot of people saying that it is not stable at all :/
I'm looking for a base that has everything core & combat related, so i never touch those again, i'm new, i don't know at all how to code these :S
Also, I would like a base that loads 602-632 data I could add this myself but it would be nice if it has it already :P
Apollo, Hyperion, Runesource (asteria), PI etc? and why should i use thems
Thank you!

item.title: Requesting best base :)
item.dc:creator: @williamduval williamduval
